answers.answer: Hi,With BS this high you need to go back to the emergency room.  You need medical assistance to manage this.   I don't think any of us here can give good advice on such a serious situation.I think that this should be managed in the hospital, not by yourself at home.  The problem is you need to get the blood sugar down. But also the risk of it going too low with the huge doses of insulin you need are also high.Worrying about you.  Please go back to the hospital.  Let us know how you go.Sally
THANK YOU! I'VE GOTTEN TO THE POINT IN WHO DO I TRUST ALL THE DOCTORS GIVE DIFFERENT OPINIONS BUT YOUR RIGHT I WILL KEEP U POSTED THANKS FOR THE TIME YOU TOOK OUT TO WRITE ME BACK

Hi,Yes, they are giving different opinions about your current illness, but what needs to be managed urgently is your dangerously high blood sugar.  Can you call your diabetes doctor about your current bs levels?Do go to the ER, please.  They will be able to help you get your BS levels managed.  How are your levels now?  Have they come down at all?

I strongly concur with Super_sally888 advice to you. You have to get the blood glucose levels down. Do you have a regular diabetes physician, or do you rely on the ER? You need a doctor with training and experience in managing dibetes to provide your health care.Please let us know how you are doing.I am praying for you,TroyTroy

question: I'M 35 I HAVE CHF AND DIABETES RIGHT NOW I HAVE A BAD COLD MY COUGH AND SHORTNESS OF BREATH SEEMS TO BE THE WORST RIGHT NOW, I WAS JUST IN THE HOSPITAL AND WAS RELEASED AFTER ALL THE DOCTORS SEEM TO HAVE DIFFERENT OPINIONS ONE DOC SAID I DINT HAVE WATER IN MY LUNGS OR HEART ANOTHER ONE SAID I DID. THEY PUT ME ON STEROIDS WHICH I KNOW MAKES MY READINGS HIGHER MY PROBLEM IS NOBODY SEEMS TO BE HELPING ME ON WHAT TO DO WHEN IT IS HIGH I JUST TOOK MY FINGER TEST IT CAME OUT TO BE 536 I TOOK 40 UNITS OF INSULIN ABOUT 45 MINS LATER I TOOK IT AGAIN NOW IT'S 556 I DONT NO HOW MUCH TO INCREASE IT TO IM ON HUMLIN R AND LANTUS I HAVE A DOCTOR WHO'S SUPPOSE TO HELP ME WITH ALL THIS BUT SHE DOESN'T SEEM TO DO ANYTHING EXCEPT ADD MORE MEDS. SOMEBODY PLZ HELP ME I DONT NO WHAT TO DO ANY FEED BACK WOULD BE GREATTHANK YOU
title: CAN ANYONE HELP ME I'M SO CONFUSED
